dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sref1.shipment_refnum_value invoice_number, sr1.remark_text lc_no, sref2.shipment_refnum_value commodity, loc1.location_name customer_name, con1.contact_xid customer_code, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, '$' || st.total_cost_formatted invoice_amt, TRIM(con2.first_name || ' ' || con2.last_name) assigned_to, (SELECT gtm_transaction_xid FROM gtm_transaction WHERE gtm_transaction_gid = ( SELECT gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum WHERE gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid = 'SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND refnum_value = s.shipment_xid)) cust_ship_id, (CASE WHEN loc2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(loc2.city || ', ' || loc2.province_code || ' ' || ccode2.country_name) ELSE TRIM(loc2.city || ' ' || ccode2.country_name) END) destination, cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value cut_date, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') departure_date, TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.arrival_date,s.dest_location_gid), 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') arrival_date, TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value) voyage_number, sref3.shipment_refnum_value bill_lading_num, loc3.location_name servprov_name, TRIM(TO_CHAR(st.filled_containers)) container_count, TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT SUM(ROUND(ssunit.unit_net_weight_base / 2.2045855379,0)) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit ssunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1) ,'999,999,990')) || ' KG' total_net_weight, (CASE WHEN l1.location_name IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN l2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(l2.city || ', ' || l2.province_code || ' ' || cc2.country_name) ELSE TRIM(l2.city || ', ' || cc2.country_name) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN l2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(l1.city || ', ' || l1.province_code || ' ' || cc1.country_name) ELSE TRIM(l1.city || ' ' || cc1.country_name) END) END) load_port, sref4.shipment_refnum_value loc_code FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON s.shipment_gid = srn.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.VIA_LOCATION_ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON 'SCOULAR.' || cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON l1.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON cv.source_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc2 ON l2.country_code3_gid = cc2.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON con1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark sr1 ON s.shipment_gid = sr1.shipment_gid AND sr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code ccode2 ON loc2.country_code3_gid = ccode2.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_TOTALS st ON st.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') invoice_number, NVL(sr1.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') lc_no, NVL(sref2.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') commodity, NVL(loc1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') customer_name, NVL(con1.contact_xid, 'Data Missing in System') customer_code, NVL(cv.charter_voyage_xid, 'Data Missing in System') booking_number, (CASE WHEN st.total_cost_formatted IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE '$' || st.total_cost_formatted END) invoice_amt, NVL(TRIM(con2.first_name || ' ' || con2.last_name), 'Data Missing in System') assigned_to, NVL((SELECT gtm_transaction_xid FROM gtm_transaction WHERE gtm_transaction_gid = ( SELECT gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum WHERE gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid = 'SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND refnum_value = s.shipment_xid)), 'Data Missing in System') cust_ship_id, (CASE WHEN loc2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(NVL(loc2.city, 'Data Missing in System') || ', ' || NVL(loc2.province_code, 'Data Missing in System') || ' ' || ccode2.country_name) ELSE NVL(TRIM(loc2.city || ' ' || ccode2.country_name), 'Data Missing in System') END) destination, NVL(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') cut_date, NVL(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') departure_date, NVL(TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.arrival_date,s.dest_location_gid), 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') arrival_date, NVL(TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value), 'Data Missing in System') voyage_number, NVL(sref3.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') bill_lading_num, NVL(loc3.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') servprov_name, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(st.filled_containers)), 'Data Missing in System') container_count, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT SUM(ROUND(ssunit.unit_net_weight_base / 2.2045855379,0)) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit ssunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1) ,'999,999,990')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' KG' total_net_weight, (CASE WHEN l1.location_name IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN l2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(NVL(l2.city, 'Data Missing in System') || ', ' || NVL(l2.province_code, 'Data Missing in System') || ' ' || cc2.country_name) ELSE NVL(TRIM(l2.city || ', ' || cc2.country_name), 'Data Missing in System') END) ELSE (CASE WHEN l2.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(NVL(l1.city, 'Data Missing in System') || ', ' || NVL(l1.province_code, 'Data Missing in System') || ' ' || cc1.country_name) ELSE NVL(TRIM(l1.city || ' ' || cc1.country_name), 'Data Missing in System') END) END) load_port, NVL(sref4.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') loc_code FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON s.shipment_gid = srn.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.VIA_LOCATION_ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON 'SCOULAR.' || cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON l1.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON cv.source_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc2 ON l2.country_code3_gid = cc2.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON con1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark sr1 ON s.shipment_gid = sr1.shipment_gid AND sr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code ccode2 ON loc2.country_code3_gid = ccode2.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_TOTALS st ON st.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT oob.order_base_xid contract_number, obr1.remark_text last_ship_date, obr2.remark_text payterm_price, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(oob.total_weight_base / 2204.5855379,0),'999,999,990')) weight_mt FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LAST SHIP DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_PRICE' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' AND NOT oob.order_base_gid IS NULL UNION SELECT NVL(oob.order_base_xid, 'Data Missing in System') contract_number, NVL(obr1.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') last_ship_date, NVL(obr2.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') payterm_price, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(oob.total_weight_base / 2204.5855379,0),'999,999,990')), 'Data Missing in System') weight_mt FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' AND NOT oob.order_base_gid IS NULL

SELECT LISTAGG(a.refnum_value, ' ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.refnum_value) origin FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssur.refnum_value FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION NAME' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL) a
